entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
